name: Star Chain
description: Star Chain is online audition platform called 'Cover Star' with blockchain token STAR(ticker is STAR1). The platform has improved the shortcomings of the existing audition market, and form a platform optimized for talent discovery through objective, transparent and fair evaluation. As a fresh platform, we will proceed to provide fans with new directional content, fair challenge opportunities for participants, and new talent discovery opportunities for planners, and to become the next generation audition platform. With Star Chain token, holders can do the followings; - participate in the audition that provide the debut chance to top ranked participants - can vote to the rankings of the audition participants - can participate or vote for the pet audition as well - can purchase celebrities' goods and merchants at online mall - can buy or subscribe to use music albums
